[Error] when prettier not working on vscode

03 Feb 2021 | vscode prettier

Copy this and paste to your workspace .vscode / settings.json

{
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "vetur.validation.template": false,
  "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
    "source.fixAll.eslint": true
  },
  "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
}
Comment  Read more

[Error] when occured less loader error in ant design Vue

03 Feb 2021 | vue error antdesign 
// vue.config.js for less-loader@6.0.0
module.exports = {
  css: {
    loaderOptions: {
      less: {
        lessOptions: {
          modifyVars: {
            'primary-color': '#1DA57A',
            'link-color': '#1DA57A',
            'border-radius-base': '2px',
          },
          javascriptEnabled: true,
        },
      },
    },
  },
};

must check less-loader version.

antdesign vue lessloader version is @6.0.0!
